Name: INFINITI VR
About the game: INFINITI IQ is a branded VR experience created by The Pulse. Yes, it’s a car ad, but unlike any car ad you’ve seen before. We believe that it’s worth experiencing purely for the photo-real environments created using photogrammetry and for the gaze activated and triggered interactions (Skimming stones, animal and car interactions) along the way.
Meta Title: INFINITI VR: Mar 28, 2017, The Pulse and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on INFINITI VR? Check out the release date (Mar 28, 2017), developer insights from The Pulse, and a complete game summary.
